gpt_comment: The day in Brussels will be sunny with average temperatures around 28°C, peaking at 34°C and dropping as low as 21°C. No rain is expected according to all sources. Perfect weather to enjoy a sunny terrace, maybe even with a cheeky monkey-themed cocktail in hand!
